channel.title: Comments on: Bing, worth switching from Google?
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: SteveO
item.dc:creator: SteveO
item.content:encoded:
I understand that Bing is brand new and may evolve into something great or left on the roadside because it was run over by google, again.

IMO Bing sucks when you are looking for answers instead of products. Or why is every dataset they return based around my making a purchase?

Bing fails to get great answers on .NET and or tsql questions and the answers are in asp.net forum.

go figure ;->

It is young. I’ll give it time to grow or get aborted.

Do you think that M$ is getting any revenue on sending users to sites as of yet? Or will they just reduce license fees as a start? Then introduce the pay me AGAIN AND AGAIN mantra.

item.title: By: Natas
item.dc:creator: Natas
item.content:encoded:
Saw this on the forum

Is Bing a recursive acronym? Bing: Bing Is Not Google?

item.title: By: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.dc:creator: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
